headline: Western Digital Announces Senior Notes Redemption
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., March 13, 2025--Western Digital Corporation (Nasdaq: WDC) announced today that it will redeem $1,800,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 4.750% Senior Notes due 2026 (the "Notes").
